channel.title: found an sdwdate bug
channel.description: Platform: KVM Whonix 15.0.1.7.2 Affected components: Can't connect to Tor. Steps to reproduce the behavior: Boot a Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation and get unlucky enough for sdwdate to fail you. Expected behavior: Can connect to Tor. Actual behavior: I have an error: /usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: Start. Static Time Sanity Check: Within minimum time 'Sun Jan 17 00:00:00 UTC 2021' and expiration timestamp 'Tue May 17 10:00:00 UTC 2033', ok. Tor Bootstrap Result: ERROR (124). Please report this bug! /usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: END: Exiting with exit_code '1' indicating 'wait, show error icon and retry.'. [REDACTED] - sdwdate - INFO - PREPARATION RESULT: (known) ERROR. Context: I can't use Whonix-Workstation to connect to Tor, therefore, I can't use it.

item.title: found an sdwdate bug
item.dc:creator: pooom
item.description:
Platform: KVM Whonix 15.0.1.7.2
Affected components: Can’t connect to Tor.
Steps to reproduce the behavior: Boot a Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation and get unlucky enough for sdwdate to fail you.
Expected behavior: Can connect to Tor.
Actual behavior: I have an error:
/usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: Start.
Static Time Sanity Check: Within minimum time ‘Sun Jan 17 00:00:00 UTC 2021’ and expiration timestamp ‘Tue May 17 10:00:00 UTC 2033’, ok.
Tor Bootstrap Result: ERROR (124).
Please report this bug!
/usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: END: Exiting with exit_code ‘1’ indicating ‘wait, show error icon and retry.’.
[REDACTED] - sdwdate - INFO - PREPARATION RESULT: (known) ERROR.
Context: I can’t use Whonix-Workstation to connect to Tor, therefore, I can’t use it.

Read full topic
